feed.subtitle: The main hub by 8holic (Real name Bryan) to create a hub to link all existing projects and files.

entry.title: First Post!
entry.content:
Hello! This is the first ever post. I am writing as 8Holic

Initally I wanted a hub page to link all my different projects, however I learnt of Jekyll and decide to learn how it works. As a side effect this blog is created.

For the time being I donâ€™t have much to link yet, through the objective is the following -The Home page,which will consist exerpts of the other part
-The about page
-The blog page
-All projects link
The projects should include both python and terminal line games to downloadable programs.

Here is to hoping this blog survives!
entry.summary: Hello! This is the first ever post. I am writing as 8Holic
